Quick Start →

The Game

A funny text adventure game for the end-user to enjoy.

MysteryMaker

The tool a content creator can use to make thier stories readable by the game and to put logic in it.

Velius Script

The scripting language used for the mysteries logic. Easy to use and powerful.
